sentences.en: All of the tugboat is blue - screened.
sentences.cn: 所有的拖船是蓝色的筛选.

sentences.en: Empoldering oneself rear tugboat can pledge delivering cloth equilibrium, chain stitch beautiful, when it fast runs.
sentences.cn: 独自开发的后拖轮能保证高速运转时送布均衡 、 线迹美观.

sentences.en: Further up the coast in Ofunato, the port’s tugboat still sits in someone’s backyard about a kilometer from the water.
sentences.cn: 沿着海岸北行到大渡船市，原来在港湾里的拖船，如今还留在距离港湾一公里远的内陆居民住家的后院。

sentences.en: Here, the wreck of a tugboat rests in its sandy Caribbean grave.
sentences.cn: 这里, 一艘拖船的遇难船休息在沙地加勒比海的墓地.

sentences.en: If the simulation can plug directly into a satellite database for real-time ocean weather tracking, it might even help future tugboat pilots safely steer with an iceberg in tow.
sentences.cn: 如果模拟系统能够直接连入海洋实时天气卫星数据库的话，未来的拖船驾驶员们将能够更安全地拖动冰山。

sentences.en: On Theodore Tugboat, the models have motors and moving eyes.
sentences.cn: 对西奥多拖轮, 该机型具有马达和移动眼睛是雪亮的.

sentences.en: One day the tugboat captain caught Sophie at work.
The damaged ship was taken in tow by a tugboat.
sentences.cn: 那只毁坏了的船由一只拖船拖著.

sentences.en: The Italian - flagged tugboat Buccaneer was hijacked in the Gulf of Aden on April 11.
sentences.cn: 这艘悬挂意大利国旗的“巴克尼亚号”拖船是4月11日在亚丁湾被海盗劫持的.

sentences.en: The smuggler shrugged to the bugler hugging the bug in the tugboat.
sentences.cn: 走私者对在拖船中拥抱臭虫的号手耸耸肩.

sentences.en: The tugboat sailed in the teeth of the wind triumphantly.
The Tugboat Saloon and Eatery is a must-visit.
sentences.cn: 拖轮沙龙和小餐馆是必去之处。

sentences.en: The tugboat towed the damaged ship into port.
sentences.cn: 拖船把坏了的船拖进港口.

sentences.en: The tugboat towed the ship out of the harbour.
sentences.cn: 拖船把这艘船拖出海港.

sentences.en: The tugboat tugged the freighter into the harbor.
sentences.cn: 拖轮把货船拖进海港了.

sentences.en: Tugboat operation is the important part of the service system of the port.
sentences.cn: 港口拖轮作业是港口服务系统的重要组成部分.

trans.tran_cn: （拖、推其他船只进出港口和码头的大马力）拖船，拖驳，拖轮，推舱
